Reviews.Title: Great Phone! *before it inevitably dies*
Reviews.Author: Screamsnthings "Screams"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Smile is a great phone. Love the interaction, clear calling, qwerty pad, slide function, display, camera, etc. However, I have owned 3 of these bad boys and ALL 3 (the last one decided to malfunction this past week) start to malfunction and/or die within a years time. Must be a chip implanted on the circuit board that has a 'self-destruct' mode built in. When they DID work - they are the best! Great phones. Reasonably prices and look nice. After a year: zippo.

Reviews.Title: Died after a year
Reviews.Author: D. Auyeung
Reviews.Content: I really miss the days when phones could last for more than a year or so.  I had a Samsung phone that lasted over 3 years back in the day.  I bought this one in May 2011, and it stopped working today (Sept. 2012).  It's quite frustrating that most people upgrade their phones every year or so, and the manufacturers no longer seem to build things to last.  I really don't want a phone that is also a GPS, music player, web surfing device, game console, dog trainer, etc.  I just want a phone that can make phone calls and last for more than a year or so.  This is not that phone.

Reviews.Title: Screen went blank
Reviews.Author: AL pat
Reviews.Content: I bought this because of the reviews. It lasted just 6 months. The screen went blank and I had to buy a new oneyou maybe sorry

Reviews.Title: This is a great little phone for those of us who do not want it to be a mini computer
Reviews.Author: M. Gorichs
Reviews.Content: I use my phone for calls and occasional texts. That is all. So I like my phone simple.  This one does the trick

Reviews.Title: good phone for a phone that's not a smart phone
Reviews.Author: Helene Leone
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I am one of the few people that doesn't have a smartphone because I just want to make calls and text. I don't need a complicated phone. T-Mobile stopped making these and mine broke so I purchased it from Amazon.  The phone was a new phone and so far, so good.. I'm sure one day I will dare to come into the 21st century and get a smart phone but for now, this phone serves my purpose.  The delivery was quick and the person I bought it from was very helpful because I had to make sure the serial numbers were compatible with T Mobile and they were.  I think it was a little pricy for this kind of phone, but it was a lot less than a smart phone.  I'll use it till it no longer works!!!!!  Great service!

Reviews.Title: Love this little phone.
Reviews.Author: moonlighting
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for almost 3 years....accidently washed it...but was excited when I found a replacement for it.You can keep the smart phones...this phone does just what I need it to do...talk, text and take an occasional pik.

Reviews.Title: phone locked, vendor rocked
Reviews.Author: Lisa Rupp
Reviews.Content: This phone arrived with a locked code that could not be broken and phone had to be returned.  Vendor was more than helpful in return stage and crediting my account.  While the phone did not work which is why I'm giving the purchase a low rating, the experience was still positive as vendor came through.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Kari Alphenaar
Reviews.Content: If you like a phone for making calls and texting, this it is.  Stands up well to average wear and tear.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE... Definitely could be cheaper...
Reviews.Author: AskingBRINGMTH
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about a year... It's a great little phone, the qwerty keyboard is nice and responsive.  And me and my sister have had the same phone (Her's being a little over a year and mine being a little under) I happened to break my phone when I was skateboarding and crashed reeeeaaally hard.  Over than that! This phone is great although I think it's a bit expensive for the phone.

Reviews.Title: very pleased with phone
Reviews.Author: Chelsea "love music"
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with the phone & already wrote my review when I received it.  Phone was in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Rosemary
Reviews.Content: Simple and easy to use for calling and texting. Also takes good pictures. Battery lasts a week. Nice looking phone.

Reviews.Title: Smiley rating
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Gant
Reviews.Content: I made a great choice it's easy to use very user friendly. Very happy and I would recommend the phone to any senior citizen.

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasts
Reviews.Author: Janice A. Stone "New Mom"
Reviews.Content: Died after 6 months. Started vibrating and then just stopped working. I liked everything about it until that point but what good it that? Not a good thing after you buy the phone,case and charger. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Shevonne L.
Reviews.Content: A brand new phone arrived quickly. It came in the original TMobile box. I had no trouble activating the phone and it seems to be working great so far. I have had it about 2 months and no issues.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Vey cheaply made
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung Smiley. It works great and i love that you dont have to flip the phone to us the keyborad. All you have to do is slide it up and that is why i love the Samsung Smiley.

Reviews.Title: I have two of these real simple and basic
Reviews.Author: mark symons
Reviews.Content: holds up well easy to read i have big hands and fingers and at first  text  might be a problembut they keys work well

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa Griffith
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Holds up against a lot, even my nine month old nephew. Love the keyboard. Have always loved this phone after my first one died I went on a search for another

Reviews.Title: GOOD FOR FIRST PHONE
Reviews.Author: caroline
Reviews.Content: For a beggninner its a great phone, this was my first phone, it did its job no complaints did its job. Very duriable. but if your looking for a fancy new phone deff dont go for this.

Reviews.Title: all T-Mobile stores should keep saling the basic cell phones. alots of use dont have internets.  we dont have money to buy inter
Reviews.Author: janie
Reviews.Content: I love my cell phone. I by 2 samsung smiley cell phone. Just in case my brakes I have one my smiley. T-mobile should keep saleing this cell phone the basic cell phone because alote of people don't knew how to use the touch phones. T-mobile dont think another people. They just think about there new cell phone that are coming out now. Im 50 years old and I dont knew how to ues the touch cell phones. You sould keep saling the basic cell phones like use. A cell that we could use and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: NOT bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Javier C.
Reviews.Content: For an old phone it is not bad but not touch screen , no wifi....But for the price I can't really complain

Reviews.Title: Very nice - works great
Reviews.Author: Jason schultz
Reviews.Content: Very nice - works great. Very nice - works greatVery nice - works greatVery nice - works greatVery nice - works great

Reviews.Title: Great 3g smartphone
Reviews.Author: Christen J. Reimer "GAME SONIC"
Reviews.Content: This phone is neat and The QWERTY keyboard is amazing!  Must buy phone if your looking for a 3g smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Good service, great shipping
Reviews.Author: Allen W. Wood
Reviews.Content: Phone received promptly many days before it was scheduled to arrive, together with a nice handwritten note. Also, unlike the last phone I ordered through Amazon, this one came with a sim card. Had I started to use the phone, the rating would be a five.

ProductInfo.Features:
CAMERA
TEXT
WEB BROWSING
QWERTY
MUSIC PLAYER
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Smiley T359 Cell Phone T-Mobile
